title: ServiceNow Developer - Business Analyst
description:
Experience - 4-8yrs, Location - Mumbai (Airoli)

JD- ServiceNow Business Analyst (TPRM)

Tech: ServiceNow, Test Cases, UAT execution

Functional: Operational Risk Management Processes, policy, requirement discussions & documentation.




Operational Risk Management processes includes Entity & Process Risk Control structure, Risk & Control Self-Assessment (RCSA) design & evaluation, Key Risk Indicator (KRI), Loss Data Capture (LDC), Loss Data Modelling, Scenario Analysis, Ops Risk Capital Charge, etc.
